code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./ClockWidget.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ClockWidget(){const[time,setTime]=useState(new Date());useEffect(()=>{const timer=setInterval(()=>setTime(new Date()),1000);return()=>clearInterval(timer);},[]);const timeStr=time.toLocaleTimeString('ru-RU',{hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit',hour12:false});const dateStr=time.toLocaleDateString('ru-RU',{year:'numeric',month:'2-digit',day:'2-digit'});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"clock-widget widget",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"clock-time",children:timeStr}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"clock-date",children:dateStr})]});}export default ClockWidget;
